tidbits.title: Lake Chad
tidbits.description: Chad is home to Lake Chad, a vital water source for multiple countries in the region, facing environmental challenges but holding cultural and ecological significance.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: Chad is rich in cultural diversity, with over 200 ethnic groups, each contributing to the country's unique traditions, languages, and crafts.

tidbits.title: Saharan and Sub-Saharan
tidbits.description: Chad's landscape spans Saharan desert regions in the north to sub-Saharan savannahs in the south, showcasing diverse environments and wildlife.
